item.title: CVE-2014-8184|2024-08-06T13:10:50.898Z -- liblouis -- liblouis
item.description: A vulnerability was found in liblouis, versions 2.5.x before 2.5.4. A stack-based buffer overflow was found in findTable() in liblouis. An attacker could create a malicious file that would cause applications that use liblouis (such as Orca) to crash, or potentially execute arbitrary code when opened.
